ygData.subject: Re: Our class
ygData.msgSnippet: As a PK wizard I feel the need to explain to you exactly why i chose to be PK.  In the bertoxulous server the highest lvl charcter i believe is lvl 20, a
ygData.messageBody:
As a PK wizard I feel the need to explain to you exactly why i chose to be
PK. In the bertoxulous server the highest lvl charcter i believe is lvl 20,
a significant amount of ppl are camping in Black Burrow waiting in the giant
snake room for giant snakes to spawn, i generally belive that as the most
powerful race/class combination (wizard/erudite) i have the right to take
whatever i want. Beyond this i follow the warlord as my deity. As you well
know, noone likes a kill "stealer", i have around 30 ppl on my ignore list
who just can't deal with the fact that wizards are their superiors. To shut
these ppl up once and for all,i turned PK. Now not only do i take whatever
monster i want, but i take out any othe PK that i want as well. In the event
that i am challenged to a duel (this happens quite often) i simply inform
them that if they turn red we can do it right, otherwise they should just
sit there and cry. PKing has it's advantages, the loot is great and it
really adds an extra sense of danger to the game, you can be in your newbie
area heading to your favorite hunting spot, you can still be attacked right
there and killed by another PK. Keeps you on your toes and i rather like it
:)
